data.body:
Objective: Add OpenRouter configuration contracts and persistence behavior without changing runtime execution.

Notes: Foundation wave; all later waves depend on stable settings shape and persistence semantics.

Assigned tasks:
- Extend settings schema with OpenRouter section
- Update settings merge logic for OpenRouter partial updates
- Add settings tests for OpenRouter defaults and TOML round-trip

data.title: Scene freeman-vertigo: Settings Contract
